item.title: Debate erupts over role job cuts played in weather forecasts ahead of deadly Texas floods

item.title: Trump to put 25% tariffs on Japan and South Korea
Girls camp grieves loss of 27 campers and counselors in Texas floods that killed nearly 90 people
